title: MINGA
description: MINGA is a website created for reading and enjoying manga. Users will be able to register, log in and read the manga they want. Also, if there are companies that want to post their products, they can do so, having access to edit and delete their manga.

title: Minga - Mobile
description: MINGA Mobile is a smartphone app created for reading manga. The user will be able to register and enjoy a variety of manga.

title: MateAr
description: MateAr is an e-commerce created for an Argentine venture, dedicated to the sale of items related to the world of mate. Here you will find a variety of products, whose search is facilitated by a search by text and categories. Also, the shopping cart option is included, and the option to buy with credit, debit and MercadoPago cards.

title: MateAr - Mobile
description: MateAr is a mobile app for an e-commerce created for an Argentine venture, dedicated to the sale of items related to the world of mate. Here you will find a variety of products, whose search is facilitated by a search by text and categories. Also, the shopping cart option is included, and the option to buy with credit, debit and MercadoPago cards.

title: Fundación Pescar: 20 aniversario
description: Website built for the 20th anniversary of the Pescar Argentina Foundation. I was in charge of the FrontEnd and the trivia game experience, where React, JavaScript and Tailwind were used.

title: ECOS
description: Ecos is a website created for people to learn, be informed and share about home cultivation. It also offers garden organization, chat and sharing functions with other app users.

title: Happy Tails - PetShop
description: Happy Tails is a Pet Shop created for a 72-hour challenge, where you can access a virtual store with pharmacy and toy store products for your pets.

title: Amazing Events
description: Amazing Events is a website created to show events in Buenos Aires. They can be accessed easily, through a filter by text and by categories.

title: PokéQuiz | Juego de preguntas y respuestas
description: Quiz game. How much do you know about Pokémon? Take this quiz and find out. This app was created with React, the styles are done with Tailwind, and all the questions were created in a data.js file.

title: Calculator
description: This is a calculator made with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

title: Tic Tac Toe Game
description: Tic Tac Toe game (también conocido como TaTeTi, en español) is the classic game for two players: Choose X or O, and try to win the match!
